name: Ext_R2_AppointmentResponse_participantStatus
title: Cross-version Extension for R2.AppointmentResponse.participantStatus for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version extension represents AppointmentResponse.participantStatus from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/AppointmentResponse|1.0.2 for use in FHIR R5.

element.short: accepted | declined | tentative | in-process | completed | needs-action
element.definition: Participation status of the participant. When the status is declined or tentative if the start/end times are different to the appointment, then these times should be interpreted as a requested time change. When the status is accepted, the times can either be the time of the appointment (as a confirmation of the time) or can be empty.
element.comment: `AppointmentResponse.participantStatus` maps to R5 `AppointmentResponse.participantStatus`. So is mapped as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget.
element.isModifierReason: This extension is a modifier because the target element AppointmentResponse.participantStatus is flagged IsModifier

element.short: accepted | declined | tentative | in-process | completed | needs-action
element.definition: Participation status of the participant. When the status is declined or tentative if the start/end times are different to the appointment, then these times should be interpreted as a requested time change. When the status is accepted, the times can either be the time of the appointment (as a confirmation of the time) or can be empty.
element.comment: `AppointmentResponse.participantStatus` maps to R5 `AppointmentResponse.participantStatus`. So is mapped as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget.

binding.description: The Participation status of an appointment.
